name: Mansherry
text: On Play: You may rest one of your {Dressrosa} type leaders or stage cards, and return one of your cost 4 or greater {Dressrosa} type characters to your hand: Return up to one of your opponent's cost 4 or lower characters to its owner's hand.

effect.text: You may rest one of your {Dressrosa} type leaders or stage cards, and return one of your cost 4 or greater {Dressrosa} type characters to your hand: Return up to one of your opponent's cost 4 or lower characters to its owner's hand.

meta.notes: Rarity is 'US' as printed in the bottom right corner. The card has a Counter +1000 icon. The text is split into two parts: the first part is the 'On Play' effect, and the second part is the 'Return up to one...' effect. The latter is a conditional effect based on the first action.
